The Micro-Credential Sustainable &
Inclusive Construction (SIC) is a comprehensive program designed to equip Master
students from diverse academic backgrounds with the entrepreneurial skills and
knowledge required to thrive in the fields of construction, building, and
living design. This Micro-Credential comprises three distinct modules, each
carefully tailored to provide a holistic understanding of entrepreneurship for sustainable
and inclusive construction.

Empower students from diverse backgrounds to
become innovative leaders in the sustainable and inclusive construction
industry, fostering positive change and driving forward the future of
construction, building, and living design.

Students can start with the MC any semester
(winter or summer). It is strongly suggested to start with the module Design
Thinking for Smart Living.
Registration for summer term 2024 is closed now. The next intake will be for the winter term 2024/2025.
Please note that you have to register for the courses Design Thinking and Venture Campus OR Treasure Hunting individually on the ISIS pages of the courses.
The language of participation and of the courses is English.
